Song.title: God Is Alive
Song.copyright: Steve Fee & Eddie Kirkland Worship Together Music (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing) Six Steps BMI Designee (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing) Eddie Kirkland Music

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [ G C G C G C F Bb/F A5]
Verse 1: [G5]Let the darkness flee, it's [Am]got no power over me [F]I have been set f[C]ree, God is al[G]ive [C G C]
Verse 2: And [G5]death where is your sting? [Am]Sin has got no hold on me [F]I am free ind[C]eed! God is al[G]ive! [C G]
Pre-Chorus 1: We've b[C5]een redeemed so [D5]rise and sing
Chorus 1: E[G]v'ryone glorify the r[Am]isen Son The holy One has o[F]vercome Jesus is al[C]ive! The e[G]nemy is broken undern[Am]eath His feet Death is crushed in v[F]ictory Jesus is al[C]ive [C(#4)] J[C]esus is al[G]ive!
Interlude: [ G C G C G C F Bb/F A5]
Verse 3: [G]Let us wake and rise, [Am]lift your voices, lift your eyes We're gonna sh[F]out, we're gonna shake the sk[C]ies! God is al[G]ive!
Bridge: The em[G]pty grave is singing now, it's sh[Am]outing out He is al[F]ive! he is al[C]ive and we are fr[G]ee!
Pre-Chorus 2: We've [C2(no3)]been redeemed so r[D]ise and sing
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 let the darkness flee its got no power over me i have been set free god is alive verse 2 and death where is your sting sin has got no hold on me i am free indeed god is alive prechorus 1 weve been redeemed so rise and sing chorus 1 evryone glorify the risen son the holy one has overcome jesus is alive the enemy is broken underneath his feet death is crushed in victory jesus is alive jesus is alive interlude verse 3 let us wake and rise lift your voices lift your eyes were gonna shout were gonna shake the skies god is alive bridge the empty grave is singing now its shouting out he is alive he is alive and we are free prechorus 2 weve been redeemed so rise and sing
